issue.title: [C++] Add include-what-you-use configuration
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1413](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1413). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I have done some ad hoc IWYU cleanup on a couple of occasions since the project started, but it would be useful to do it more systematically. Apache Kudu has been working on this recently, so we may be able to bootstrap our efforts on this based on their work:

https://github.com/apache/kudu/tree/master/build-support/iwyu
